concept.title: comb
concept.shortdesc: Description of the comb supplementary matcher.

conbody.p:
The comb supplementary matcher queries the combining diacritic section of a phone. It accepts a single parameter which can be either:
A single character
A feature set matcher
A phone class matcher The matcher will match if any of the combining diacritics of the phone match the given argument.

example.p: Search for a phone that has the combining diacritic \u0300.:comb("\u0300")
